BUREAU OF COMMUNITY AND HEALTH SYSTEMS
ADDENDUM TO ORIGINAL LICENSING STUDY REPORT
I. IDENTIFYING INFORMATION
License #: CB330371021
Licensee Name: Wellspring Lutheran Services
Licensee Address: 4100 Pier N. Blvd Ste. A
Flint, MI 48504-1487

Name of Facility: Wellspring Lutheran Services -E. Lansing
Facility Address: 2875 Northwind Ste. 103
East Lansing, MI 48823
Facility Telephone #: (517) 664-1032
Capacity:
Program Type: CHILD PLACING AGENCY, PRIVATE
1

II. Purpose of Addendum
Agency relocation. 3681 Okemos Rd., Suite 500, Okemos, MI 48864
III. Methodology
Onsite visit completed on 11/13/2018.
IV. Description of Findings and Conclusions
The new location consisted of a waiting room area, reception area, common work
area, and individual offices, storage areas, conference room and private visitation
areas for the provision of services. The agency was located in a business/office
complex that was easily accessible and accessible by public transportation. Both
the complex and the agency offices appeared to be relatively new and well
maintained. The agency rooms were clean, attractive and well lit by both natural
light and commercial lighting.
This agency location and resources appear to be more than adequate to provide a
quality level of services to the children and families served by this agency.
V. Recommendation
I recommend the new location be approved and identified in the established
information system as the current location of services by this agency.
11/27/2018
________________________________________
Mark R. Hunter Date
Licensing Consultant
